skillTree.localised_description: This adept uses the Winds of Magic to seek out arcane artefacts.
This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.
A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.
Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
This one is no apprentice in the black arts but a master of Necromancy and Dark Magic.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Vampires spells
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of Years"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Wind of Death Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Vlad is borne to battle by powerful, dark effluvia, moving with a speed beyond mortal perception.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit ignores speed and combat penalties caused by terrain and can move through trees.

skillTree.localised_description: Vlad shares his aberrant immortality with those he trusts, ensuring his legacy endures eternally.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +230
	(local armies)

Unit experience gain per turn: +150
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: The Lord of the von Carsteins exudes a distracting and sensational air, giving all before him pause.

effects.description: Improves "Aura of Dark Grandeur" with a penalty to enemy melee attack

skillTree.localised_description: It takes a combination of madness, desperation and an iron stomach to be levied alongside the living dead.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +15% for Sylvanian Crossbowmen and Sylvanian Handgunners units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +15% for Sylvanian Crossbowmen and Sylvanian Handgunners units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Come, my night-shape servants, we have a great work ahead of us."
Skill honed by centuries, strength tempered by blood.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
"See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."
"Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"
The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.
Strike hard, strike true.
The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Invocation of Nehek"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Vanhel's Danse Macabre Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Gaze of Nagash"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Gaze of Nagash Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Gaze of Nagash Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Raise Dead Upgraded"
Spell number of uses: +1 for "Raise Dead" and "Raise Dead Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Skeleton Warriors

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of Years"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Wind of Death"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Wind of Death Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wind of Death Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.
"I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"
"Arise my host, my Unliving minions - bring me victory!"

skillTree.localised_description: "Can you hear it… the call of the night? Time for its children to arise and swarm."

skillTree.localised_description: Such evil spirits are desperate to spill mortal blood, and will speed along until they find some flesh to carve.

skillTree.localised_description: The Undead Lord has followed the warrior's path to its ultimate conclusion, in a dark mockery of a Knight's vow.

skillTree.localised_description: The power of death cannot be denied.

skillTree.localised_description: The Dark Magic-user can take to the skies, defying gravity by metamorphosing into a bat.

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.
Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.
A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(Heroes in local region)

skillTree.localised_description: The sun is no ally of the dead - a sky scorched black, or darkest night, will invigorate the Unliving.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for Lords
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.
W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.
This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.
This Lord can hear the thoughts of mortals for leagues around, and plan accordingly.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is Undead (does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable when Leadership is low).

items.colour_text: This accursed blade drinks deep of its victim's blood, restoring vigour and strength to the one who brandishes it.
An ancestral ring, set with a gem of deep, sanguine claret that has granted the von Carsteins everlasting Undeath.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Surrender and serve me in life, or die and slave for me in death."

effects.description: Undying Love: +15 to Melee Attack and Melee Defence when Vlad and Isabella are reinforcing each other

All units in Vlad von Carstein's army receive Vanguard Deployment
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
